data.title: Raul Mendiola
data.meta_description: View season stats, player information, and latest news of Las Vegas Lights FC Midfielder Raul Mendiola on the official website of the USL Championship.
data.text:
Raul Mendiola News

Playmaker Mendiola Makes Return to Lights FC

Former Western Conference title-winner recorded 10 goals for club in 2018 season

NEW ARRIVALS: Mendiola Leads Trio of San Diego Signings

Former Galaxy Homegrown joined by Moshobane, Jaen in SD Loyal’s midfield corps

Bethlehem’s Romero Voted Championship Player of the Week

Recorded 11-save shutout as Steel FC took victory on road against Louisville

Three Things That Mattered - Reno Battles Back

Kléber delivers Austin's first goal; Brown stays hot with second-half brace

ARLIA: Three Teams That Missed the 2018 Playoffs That Will Make the 2019 Field

Why coaching changes, new additions will reverse the fortunes for trio of bounce-back candidates
